root: ^You stand before a towering, ornate mirror. Your reflection stares back at you... and grins mockingly.

c-0: ^You strike the glass. The shards don't fall, but swirl in a dark vortex before forging themselves into a wicked-looking [Blade of Nightmares].
c-1: ^You turn away, but the reflection's laughter echoes in your mind, gnawing at your resolve. (-25% current HP)
